getFieldValue

public static java.lang.String getFieldValue(com.percussion.cms.objectstore.IPSItemAccessor item,
                                             java.lang.String fieldName)
                                      throws com.percussion.cms.PSCmsException
Gets the value of a field, handling null or empty fields.

Parameters:
item - the item
fieldName - the field name
Returns:
the value of the field. Never null may be empty
Throws:
com.percussion.cms.PSCmsException - when value cannot be converted

getFieldValueRaw

public static java.lang.Object getFieldValueRaw(com.percussion.cms.objectstore.IPSItemAccessor item,
                                                java.lang.String fieldName)
                                         throws com.percussion.cms.PSCmsException
Gets the raw value of a field

Parameters:
item - the item or child to get the field from.
fieldName - the field name
Returns:
the value as an Object. Will be null if the field does not exist or has no values.
Throws:
com.percussion.cms.PSCmsException

getFieldNumeric

public static java.lang.Number getFieldNumeric(com.percussion.cms.objectstore.IPSItemAccessor item,
                                               java.lang.String fieldName)
                                        throws com.percussion.cms.PSCmsException
Gets a numeric field

Parameters:
item - the item or child to get the field from
fieldName - the field name
Returns:
the field value as a number. Will be ZERO if the field does not exist, has no values, or is not a number.
Throws:
com.percussion.cms.PSCmsException - when an error occurs

Parameters:
item - the item
fieldName - the field name
Returns:
true if this is a binary field.

Parameters:

fieldName - the field name
Returns:
the date value. Will be null if the field does not exist, has no values or is not a date.
